remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对象 的类型为或, 则方法会将对象添加到控件的。否则,将引发。The method adds an object to the control's if the object is of the type or ; otherwise, an is thrown. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能。 The method is primarily used by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法, 以便它始终确定所分析的对象是否为类型或。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always determines whether the parsed object is of the type or . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定或确定控件的宽度 (以字符为字符)。 Use the property to specify or determine the width (in characters) of the control. 如果输入的文本比文本框的宽度长, 则文本将在控件的下一行自动继续。If you enter text that is longer than the width of the text box, the text automatically continues on the next line of the control. 若要控制控件的高度, 请设置属性。To control the height of the control, set the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制控件的宽度。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the width of the control. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的唯一标识符名。

span.span: Gets or sets the unique identifier name for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 属性的值。

span.span: A string that represents the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可确定控件的唯一标识符名称。 Use the property to determine the unique identifier name for the control. 在此属性实现中, `get`访问器返回属性的值。In this implementation of the property, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 但是, `set`访问器不会为此属性赋值。However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property. > [!NOTE] > 访问器不为此属性赋值, 因为属性必须与属性具有相同的值, 这样控件才能正常工作。 `set`The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the property must have the same value as the property for the control to work properly. 如果需要, 从类继承的类可以重写此实现。Classes that inherit from the class may override this implementation, if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来选择页上的控件并设置其属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to select an control on a page and set its property. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaName/CS/htmltextareanamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaName/VB/htmltextareanamevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知控件在保存视图状态和呈现内容之前执行任何必需的步骤。The method notifies the control to perform any necessary steps prior to saving the view state and rendering content. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能。 The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法, 以便始终在自定义服务器控件中显示5行和75列。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to always display 5 rows and 75 columns in a custom server control. span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is properly registered with the page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnServerChange(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnServerChange (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnServerChange : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnServerChange : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

summary.span: 这使您可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件的内容在向服务器的各次发送过程中发生更改时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the content of the control changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 仅当用户启动向服务器发出的 post (例如单击`submit`按钮) 时, 才会引发此事件。This event is only raised when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a `submit` button. 此事件不会导致发送到服务器。This event does not cause a post to the server to occur. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用 viewstate 才能使事件正常工作。The control must have viewstate enabled for the event to work correctly. 此事件通常用于在用户更新控件中的文本时对控件执行数据验证。This event is commonly used to perform data validation on the control when the user updates the text in the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和创建自定义事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and create a custom event handler for the event. 当控件中输入的值超过20个字符时, 将显示一条消息。A message is displayed when the value entered in the control exceeds 20 characters. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法直接呈现控件的属性, 以确保它与属性具有相同的值。 `name` The method renders the `name` attribute of the control directly to ensure that it has the same value as the property. 在呈现属性后, 方法将调用基类的方法。After rendering the attribute, the method calls the base class's method. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能。 The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法, 以便始终为控件显示特定标题文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific title text is always displayed for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTextAreaRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTextAreaRenderAttributes/cs/custom_htmltextarea_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTextAreaRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTextAreaRenderAttributes/vb/custom_htmltextarea_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTextAreaRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTextAreaRenderAttributes/cs/custom_htmltextarea_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTextAreaRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTextAreaRenderAttributes/vb/custom_htmltextarea_renderattributes.vb#2)]

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定或确定控件的高度 (以字符为字符)。 Use the property to specify or determine the height (in characters) of the control. 如果输入的文本所用的行数超出了指定的高度, 则会启用滚动条。If you enter text that takes up more lines than the height specified, scroll bars are enabled. 若要控制控件的宽度, 请设置属性。To control the width of the control, set the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制控件的高度。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the height of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaRows#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaRows/CS/htmltextarearowscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaRows#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaRows/VB/htmltextarearowsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ServerChange As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 控件的内容在向服务器的各次发送过程中发生更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the content of the control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件的内容在向服务器的各次发送过程中发生更改时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the content of the control changes between posts to the server. 此事件通常用于对文本框执行数据验证。This event is commonly used to perform data validation on the text box. > [!NOTE] > 仅当用户启动向服务器发出的 post (如单击`submit`按钮) 时, 才会引发此事件。This event is only raised when the user initiates a post to the server, such as clicking a `submit` button. 此事件不会导致发送到服务器。This event does not cause a post to the server to occur. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用 viewstate 才能使事件正常工作。The control must have viewstate enabled for the event to work correctly. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和创建自定义事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and create a custom event handler for the event. 当控件中输入的值超过10个字符时, 将显示一条消息。A message is displayed when the value entered in the control exceeds 10 characters. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件中输入的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text entered in the control.

value.span: 在 控件中输入的文本。

span.span: The text entered in the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式控制在控件中输入的文本。 Use the property to programmatically control the text entered in the control. 此属性通常用于检索在文本框中输入的文本, 但您也可以使用它来指定要在控件中显示的文本。This property is commonly used to retrieve the text entered in the text box, but you can also use it to specify the text to display in the control. 如果要在控件中提供默认值或显示消息, 这会很有用。This is useful if you want to provide a default value or display a message in the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定控件的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the contents of the control. 然后, 在网页中显示内容。The contents are then displayed in the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextArea2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextArea2/CS/htmltextareacs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextArea2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextArea2/VB/htmltextareavb.aspx#1)]
